entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
